com.xeiam.xchange.bitstamp
Class BitstampAdapters

java.lang.Object
  com.xeiam.xchange.bitstamp.BitstampAdapters

public final class BitstampAdapters
extends Object

Various adapters for converting from Bitstamp DTOs to XChange DTOs
